mapper.select: SELECT /*+ USE_NL(S1 S2 S3 S4) INDEX(S4) */ S1.PD_CD , S3.SAP_MAT_EVL_CLSS_VAL AS SAP_MAT_EVL_CLSS_VAL /*SAP자재평가클래스*/ , S3.SAP_MAT_CD /*SAP자재코드*/ FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS S1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_REL S2 ON S1.PD_CD =S2.BASE_PD_CD AND S2.PD_REL_TP_CD ='05' /* 기준상품 - 제품 */ AND S2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS S3 ON S2.OJ_PD_CD = S3.PD_CD AND S3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_GBCO_SAP_MAT_RCV_IZ S4 ON S3.SAP_MAT_CD = S4.SAP_MAT_CD AND S4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE S1.PD_CD = #{pdCd} /*VO에 들어온 상품코드 EX) EP01100317'*/ AND ROWNUM <= 1

SELECT MAX(SLP_MAPNG_CDV) AS SLP_MAPNG_CDV FROM TB_CBCL_SLP_BASE_INF_BAS WHERE CNDT_VARB_NM1 = #{sapPdDvCd} AND NVL(CNDT_VARB_NM2,'0') = #{sellInflwChnlDtlCd} AND NVL(CNDT_VARB_NM3,'0') = (CASE WHEN #{ogTpCd} = 'W01' THEN 'W01' ELSE '0' END ) AND SAP_BZ_TERY_CD = '1210'

SELECT /*+ USE_NL(T1 T2) LEADING(T1 T2) */ T1.LGST_SPP_MTHD_CD AS SPP_MTHD_TP_CD /*배송방식유형코드*/ , T1.SAP_PLNT_CD /*SAP플랜트코드*/ , SUBSTR(T2.SAP_SAVE_LCT_CD,-4) AS SAP_SAVE_LCT_CD /*SAP저장위치코드*/ , T1.LGST_ITM_GD_CD /*물류품목등급코드 -14일이나반품건이나 폐기건 찾는건데.. 입출금에서 못줄꺼 대비*/ FROM TB_IFIN_OSTR_AK_DTL_SEND_ETXT T1 INNER JOIN TB_IFIN_ITM_OSTR_AK_SEND_ETXT T2 ON T1.LGST_OSTR_AK_NO = T2.LGST_OSTR_AK_NO AND T1.SAP_PLNT_CD = T2.SAP_PLNT_CD WHERE 1=1 AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} GROUP BY T1.LGST_SPP_MTHD_CD /*배송방식유형코드*/ , T1.SAP_PLNT_CD /*SAP플랜트코드*/ , T2.SAP_SAVE_LCT_CD /*SAP저장위치코드*/ , T1.LGST_ITM_GD_CD

SELECT MAX(SLP_MAPNG_CDV) AS SLP_MAPNG_CDV FROM TB_CBCL_SLP_BASE_INF_BAS WHERE SLP_BASE_CDV = 'SAP_SL_TP_CD' AND SAP_BZ_TERY_CD = '1210' AND CNDT_VARB_NM1 = #{tempSellTpDtlCd} /*판매유형상세코드. 매출인식분류코드가 S로 시작하는경우 ANY 를 넣어줌. */ AND CNDT_VARB_NM2 = #{tempSlRcogClsfCd} /*매출인식분류코드 => W00 으로 되어잇는건 W로 넘김 */ AND CNDT_VARB_NM3 = #{slTpDvCd} /*매출유형구분*/ AND CNDT_VARB_NM4 = #{clssVal} /*평가클래스구분*/ AND CNDT_VARB_NM5 = #{addCondition} /*추가조건*/

SELECT MAX(SLP_MAPNG_CDV) FROM TB_CBCL_SLP_BASE_INF_BAS WHERE SLP_BASE_CDV = 'SAP_BIZ_DV_CD' AND SAP_BZ_TERY_CD = '1210' AND CNDT_VARB_NM1 = #{tempSellTpDtlCd} /*판매유형상세코드. 매출인식분류코드가 S로 시작하는경우 ANY 를 넣어줌. */ AND CNDT_VARB_NM2 = #{tempSlRcogClsfCd} /*매출인식분류코드 => W00 으로 되어잇는건 W로 넘김 */ AND CNDT_VARB_NM3 = #{addCondition} /*추가조건 - (SAP업무구분코드에서만) 3이 들어오는 경우는 0으로 변경하여 여기넣어줌 */
SELECT PD_PRP_VAL11 AS BH_YN FROM TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL /*상품각사속성상세*/ WHERE PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'IND' AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND PD_CD = #{pdCd} /*상품코드*/
